remarks: A formula resulting from proper substitution in a bounded formula is bounded.  This probably cannot be proved from the other axioms, since neither the definiens in ~ df-sb , nor probably any other equivalent formula, is syntactically bounded.  (Contributed by BJ, 3-Oct-2019.)
statement:
bdsb.1 $e |- Bdd ph $.
ax-bdsb $p |- Bdd [ y / x ] ph $.
